page.title: 05THE CRUSHER PLANT
page.content: The crusher plant was opened in 1949 and, up to 1980 it had crushed {112 million tonnes of limestone.}It is capable of crushing{1000 tonnes of {limestone in an hour.}There are also two smaller crushers. The primary crusher can crush stones as big as a person down to pieces as small as a hand. The machine is bell-shaped, and it weighs {25 tonnes.}It is remotely controlled from a control panel by operators who can see what is happening on two {closed circuit T.V. {monitors. } It is very dusty in the crusher plant, so special clothing has to be worn. It is also very noisy, so ear muffs are essential.
